title: When I am unsure about a ruling & can't get ahold of the Sheikh I trust, what to do? assimalhakeem
transcript: sadman from Bangladesh alikum she what to do when I am concerned regarding something whether it's sinful or not but I could not find any videos of the shake I trust for fatwa or I couldn't get any F from the other one or two Shake I trust especially for the situation I'm in but I need a ruling on that so what should I do in that case Allah says fear Allah to the best of your ability call the sheh that you trust if not then call the other Sheikh and call the third sheh until you reach a conclusion
